ref: 8431 prakara m. ʻ scattered heap ʼ MBh. [Cf. *prakāra -- 2. -- &rcirclemacr Pk. pagara -- , paya˚ m. ʻ collection, heap ʼ; Or. (Sambhalpur) paer, ˚rī ʻ treading of paddy sheaves by bullocks ʼ; Bi. pair (Gaya) ʻ heap of grain and chaff ready for winnowing ʼ, (Shahabad) ʻ crop spread out for threshing ʼ, pāer (Patna), pairā (Gaya) ʻ seed sown on unploughed land ʼ, (NW) ʻ mixed crop of peas, grain, barley and wheat ʼ, Mth. (WTirhut) pair ʻ id. ʼ; Bhoj. païri ʻ scattered heap of corn for threshing ʼ; M. per m. ʻ rice stalks &c. cast on threshing floor to be trodden out ʼ (LM 370 < pradara -- ); -- Ku. N. pairo ʻ landslip ʼ (< ʻ *heap of earth and stones ʼ) poss. < pradara -- or less likely still < *pragira -- ; -- Kho. (Lor.) pēri ʻ snowdrift ʼ must be separated from prakara -- which would be Kho. *pogor. -- See *prakura -- .
